Ben is a blind gamer who plays a mean game of Killer Instinct. He's at the E3 expo to press developers to make more titles accessible to those with disabilities. See all our E3 coverage: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-22774341

A concert hall in Germany has had thousands of unique parts designed by computers to provide its audience with the best possible sound.
The airline Flybe has been fined £70,000 for sending more than 3.3 million marketing emails to people who had opted out of receiving them.

A partnership between Levi’s and Google has yielded the Jacquard, a denim jacket with technology woven into the fabric.
YouTube star: Beckii became a celebrity in Japan when she was just 14, now she is a role model for teenage girls. She was live taking your questions.
